entry.title: A & B. The history of the <blink> tag.
A & B. The history of the <blink> tag.
A & B. The history of the <blink> tag. And a link.
A & B. The history of the <blink> tag. This one is actually invalid in Atom 1.0.
entry.content: title with type=text/plain. This is not valid in Atom 1.0, where type must be one of text|html|xhtml. So libsyndication does not parse it for now. If this becomes a problem with real-world feeds, we might parse less strict in future.

entry.title: RXhhbXBsZSA8Yj5BdG9tPC9iPg==
entry.content: Invalid. base64-encoded title with type=application/octet-stream. Types other than text, html, xhtml are invalid in Atom 1.0.
